    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 com.mpos.lottery.te.gamespec.sale.service.AbstractRiskControlService

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String ALGORITHM_TYPE_A
      For typeA, digital game will support multiple winner analysis, that says a ticket may join multiple winner analysis.
      static java.lang.String ALGORITHM_TYPE_B
      For typeB, K equals with N, so player can only buy. for example 4D, ticket, and this ticket may win(here we assume K=4, N=4), First 4D First 3D Last 3D First 2D Last 2D First 1D Last 1D
      static java.lang.String ALGORITHM_TYPE_C
      For typeC, K doesn't equals with N, so player can buy, for example 4D, 3D, 2D, 1D, ODD/EVEN and SUM.
      static java.lang.String ALGORITHM_TYPE_E
      Supports only XD, for example if K/N(N=6), then only 6D allowed.

        • 字段详细资料

          • ALGORITHM_TYPE_A

            public static final java.lang.String ALGORITHM_TYPE_A
            For typeA, digital game will support multiple winner analysis, that says a ticket may join multiple winner analysis. For this type, K equals with N, so player can only buy, for example 4D, and can win only 'Frist4D' and 'First Mixture'
            另请参阅:
            常量字段值

          • ALGORITHM_TYPE_B

            public static final java.lang.String ALGORITHM_TYPE_B
            For typeB, K equals with N, so player can only buy. for example 4D, ticket, and this ticket may win(here we assume K=4, N=4),
            • First 4D
            • First 3D
            • Last 3D
            • First 2D
            • Last 2D
            • First 1D
            • Last 1D
            另请参阅:
            常量字段值

          • ALGORITHM_TYPE_C

            public static final java.lang.String ALGORITHM_TYPE_C
            For typeC, K doesn't equals with N, so player can buy, for example 4D, 3D, 2D, 1D, ODD/EVEN and SUM. For a given bet option, the prize levels it can win are as below(here we assume K=2, N=4),
            bet option prize level
            4D First 4D
            Mixture 4D
            3D First 3D
            Last 3D
            Mixture 3D
            2D First 2D
            Last 2D
            Mixture 2D
            ODD ODD
            EVEN EVEN
            SUM SUM
            另请参阅:
            常量字段值

          • ALGORITHM_TYPE_E

            public static final java.lang.String ALGORITHM_TYPE_E
            Supports only XD, for example if K/N(N=6), then only 6D allowed.
            另请参阅:
            常量字段值

        • 方法详细资料

          • determineOddsOfEntry

            protected java.util.List<ChanceOdds> determineOddsOfEntry(Context respCtx,
                                              BaseTicket ticket,
                                              BaseGameInstance gameInstance,
                                              BaseEntry entry)
                                                   throws ApplicationException
            从类复制的说明: AbstractRiskControlService
            Determine the odds of given entry. Even a multiple entry, all single selected number share the same odds.The risk prize amount should be the max prize amount a selected number possibly win.
            指定者:
            determineOddsOfEntry 在类中 AbstractRiskControlService
            参数:
            respCtx - The context of sale transaction.
            ticket - The sold ticket.
            gameInstance - In which the turnover will be verified. The ticket.getGameInstance() will always return the game instance which is the one in which the ticket is sold.
            entry - The entry from which the single selected numbers derived.
            返回:
            All possible prize levels a entry may win
            抛出:
            ApplicationException - if fail to get risk prize amount.

          • determineFinalLossAmountOfPrizeLevel

            protected java.math.BigDecimal determineFinalLossAmountOfPrizeLevel(java.math.BigDecimal finalLimit,
                                                        java.util.List<ChanceOdds> chanceOdds,
                                                        BaseGameInstance gameInstance)
            从类复制的说明: AbstractRiskControlService
            Determine the final loss amount of a prize level. In general it should be (finalLimit/countOfPrizeLevelOfGameInstance)
            指定者:
            determineFinalLossAmountOfPrizeLevel 在类中 AbstractRiskControlService
            参数:
            finalLimit - The allowed loss prize amount of a game instance.
            chanceOdds - THose chance odds of a given entry.
            gameInstance - the game instance of current sale.
            返回:
            The final loss amount of a prize level

          • determineBettingNumberOfPrizeLevel

            protected java.lang.String determineBettingNumberOfPrizeLevel(Context respCtx,
                                                  BaseEntry entry,
                                                  ChanceOdds chanceOdd,
                                                  ChanceOfEntry chance)
                                                       throws ApplicationException
            从类复制的说明: AbstractRiskControlService
            Determine the betting number of a specific prize level. For example a '4D' entry '2,0,1,4' may win 'First4D', 'first3D' and 'last3d', then the betting number of each prize level types will be,
            • first4d - 2,0,1,4
            • first3d - 2,0,1
            • last3d - 0,1,4
            指定者:
            determineBettingNumberOfPrizeLevel 在类中 AbstractRiskControlService
            参数:
            respCtx - The context of current transaction.
            entry - the ticket entry.
            chanceOdd - The odds and prize level type of a given chance.
            chance - The chance which may win a prize.
            返回:
            the betting number of a specific prize level
            抛出:
            ApplicationException - if encounter any biz exception.

                                            BaseEntry entry)

          • determineActualSum

            protected int determineActualSum(int numberOfBall,
                     int minNumberOfBall,
                     int maxNumberOfBall,
                     int selectedSum)
            For SUM bet option, the prize level definition may like below(Lets say it is 3D, and each ball ranges from 0 to 9, so the min sum is 0 and max sum is 27):
            Sum Odds
            0 or 36 100
            1 or 35 90
            2 or 34 80
            ...
            18 50
            So this method has to convert the selected number into a value which is less than middle number. In this case, the middle number is (0+36)/2=18, then if the selected number is 35, it will be converted into 1, and more.
            • 1 -> 1
            • 35 -> 1
            • 2 -> 2
            • 34 -> 2
            • ...
            • 18 -> 18
            No choice, M.Lottery saves the prize definition in that way, TE has to make such cumbersome work to suit it.
            参数:
            numberOfBall - How many balls are supported by this digital game.
            minNumberOfBall - The minimum number of a ball.
            maxNumberOfBall - The maximum number of a ball.
            selectedSum - The sum selected by player.
            返回:
            The actual sum converted from player chose sum.
